overview: This DVD features the historical concert of the reunion of the original members in the renowned Mexico City venue Auditorio Nacional in 1999. Relive this historic musical event through 13 hits from the pioneering Mexican pop group who spearheaded the pop group musical movement in Latin America. Also included is a bonus music video and interviews.
tagline: In 1999 the Mexican band Timbiriche reunited to play a glorious concert. Thirteen songs from this momentous occasion are included on this release.
title: Timbiriche: The Concert
